1) Please move to WTPM5, Eclipse 3.1, and XDoclet 1.2.3, ejb generation is a
byproduct of  xdoclet.

2) Provide the annotated code for your  bean.  

3) I see a name "EJB_ws",  it is quite impossible to create a bean with that
name using WTP.  Are you mixing your own EJBs with WTP generated ones?

Now I am using WTPM5, Eclipse 3.1, and XDoclet 1.2.3, for ejb generation. And I 
am getting "java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" this Exception while 
trying to create an EJB Project, Now Please tell me What to do with this 
problem.
please Help Me it's very Important for Me!...
Naci, is a fix for this bug still planned for WTP 0.7?
This bug was fixed.  ejbCreate method is created.  Cannot recreate the problem

This bug is being moved to the "closed" state since it has been in the fixed state for a so long it is being assumed fixed, without explicit verification from the originator. If there is still a problem, in the most recent 1.5.x builds, please reopen or open another bug.

traces.message: Verification of Enterprise Beans  failed, see above for error messages.
